row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &MANDANT# = '&MANDANTEN#' :SET &GEN_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'Ablaufmgt_Infobrief_Gen' :SET &VERARB_ART# = 'I' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&GEN_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' ! --------------------------------------------- :PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY1 = "Mandant: &MANDANT#" :PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY2 = "Verarb: &VALUTA#" ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# VALUTA = &VALUTA# VTRNR_VON = &AB_VTR_NR# VTRNR_BIS = &BIS_VTR_NR# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_GEN# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_GEN# MANDANT = &MANDANT# BESCHREIBUNG = &GEN_BESCHREIBUNG# VERARB_ART = &VERARB_ART# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- :IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = "J" echo 'Test &PROGRAM# &TS#' > &WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#_1.out :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
